extendedInfo.description: Browse the PFRPG Reference Document completely offline, with a five-level index with 11.441 choices, for a very fast consulting.PFRPG stands for PF Role Playing Game, the fantasy RPG by Paizo Publishing.The contents of the Reference Document are updated to 30 March 2012.There are also other feature:â¢ Multi-tab browsingâ¢ Search System, with the ability to search for any word in the index.â¢ It is also possible to search trough "Quick search box" widgetâ¢ Search in pageâ¢ Bookmarksâ¢ Support for large screen/honeycomb/tabletâ¢ Five-level index, with over 11.400 choicesâ¢ Completely offline browsingThis is a Lite version of the app, that contains only Core Rulebook (except magict items) and Game Mastery  Guide.*** This Lite version contain advertising and collects anonymous statistics usageMAIN INDEX******** Core Rulebook ********(0) Getting Started(1) Races(2) Classes(3) Using Skills(4) Skill Descriptions(5) Feats(6) Equipment(7) Additional Rules(8) Combat(9) Magic(10) Spell Lists(11) Spell Index(12) Prestige Classes(13) Gamemastering(14) Environment(15) NPC Classes(16) Creating NPCs(17) Magic Items(18) Glossary******** Advanced ********(19) Races(20) Base Classes(21) Core Classes(22) Prestige Classes(23) Feats(24) Gear(25) Spell Lists(26) Spell Index(27) Magic Items(28) New Rules******** Ultimate Magic ********(29) Magus(30) Spellcasting Class Options(31) Mastering Magic(32) Feats(33) Words of Power(34) Spells(35) Spell Lists(36) Updates******** Ultimate Combat ********(37) Gunslinger(38) Ninja(39) Samurai(40) Class Archetypes(41) Feats(42) Mastering Combat(43) Vehicles(44) Variant Rules(45) Spell Index(46) Spell Lists******** Game Mastery Guide ********(47) Planar Adventures(48) Settlements(49) Fast Play Ship Combat(50) Chases(51) Disasters(52) Drugs and Addiction(53) Haunts(54) Hazards(55) Sanity and Madness(56) NPC Boons(57) NPC Gallery******** Bestiary ********(58) Monster Introduction(59) Monster Index(60) Monster Creation(61) Monster Advancement(62) Universal Monster Rules(63) Creature Types(64) Monsters as PCs(65) Monster Feats(66) Monster Cohorts(67) Monsters by Type(68) Monsters by CR(69) Monsters by Terrain(70) Variant Monster Index(71) Monsters Roles(72) Encounter Tables******** Bestiary 2 ********(73) Monster Index(74) Monster Advancement(75) Universal Monster Rules(76) Creature Types(77) Monster Cohorts(79) Animal Companions******** Bestiary 3 ********(80) Monster Index(81) Monster Advancement(82) Universal Monster Rules(83) Creature Types(84) Monster Cohorts(85) Animal CompanionsChangelog 1.3.0â¢ Added more debug info for Google Licensing Systemâ¢ Reference Document updatedChangelog 1.2.8â¢ UI improvements for Honeycomb and Ice Cream SandwitchChangelog 1.2.6â¢ Reference Document updated (Bestiary 3)â¢ Now the index contains 11.414 choicesChangelog 1.2.5â¢ Now the index contains 11.006 choicesChangelog 1.2.4â¢ Reference Document updatedâ¢ Various Bugfixesâ¢ Better support for Android Honeycomb and Ice Cream Sandwichâ¢ New icon and UI theme (thanks to Giuseppe Lanza)Changelog 1.2.3â¢ Reference Document updatedâ¢ Now the index contains 10649 version contain all base contentTags: rpg,d20,prd,pfrpg,pf,advanced,ogl,ogc,pfsrd,  path finder, magic ultimate, combat ultimate dungeons, dragons, dnd

reviews.title: Hell ya
reviews.comment: Thank you so much for making this! Your making game night sooo much easier
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Practical and useful
reviews.comment: UI feels a bit uninspired, but a solid and useful companion to any Pathfinder game. Much easier than trying to access the SRD from my phones browser.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Was Good, Better App Available Now...
reviews.comment: The Pathfinder Open Reference app by Masterwork Tools is free and 100% complete. This app is part of the core book (but lists the headings for everything without telling you what isn\'t available) and spies on you (it says so in the expanded description). Pass.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent design, but expensive
reviews.comment: The presentation is fine, nothing special, but the \'lite\' version is only part of even the core book and $3 for the full set just isn\'t worth it when i can load the official PRD thru my phone\'s browser for free
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Feats man I ain\'t got a credit card and if I did wouldn\'t trust anybody with it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent
